article_node.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra $300 off, but only in these two colors
article_node.summary: Samsung is offering a $300 discount on its Galaxy S25 Ultra, available only in Titanium Silverblue and Titanium Whitesilver colors, bringing the price to $999.99. The flagship phone boasts a 6.9-inch QHD+ display, 12GB RAM, Snapdragon 8 Elite, 200MP main camera, and 100x Space Zoom, along with a built‑in S Pen. While praised for performance, display, and battery life, critics note its large size, lack of Bluetooth S Pen features, and high price. The deal is currently available on Amazon, with other colors priced near $1,050.
